original_title: Sri Lanka to lease reservoir islet to UAE firm for hotel
original_body_lines: ECONMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s cabinet of ministers had approved a proposal by President Ranil Wickremesinghe has minister of investment promotion to lease an islet and land by a reservoir to build a luxury hotel.
United Arab Emirates based Capital Investment LLC had proposed to acquire land adjacent to the Moussakele reservoir and islet on a long term basis, a statement from the state information office said.
The property is now in the custody of the Ceylon Electricity Board.
The firm plans to investment 25 million US dollars to build a hotel. (Colombo/June27/2023)
